Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 wide turns down the leg side, Ponting misses on the shot
Harbhajan to Ponting, 2 runs whips one wide of long on, and David comes back for the second, good running
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run sweeps this one backward of square leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run turning down the leg side, pulled away to deep square leg
Khan to Hussey, 1 run low full toss on the leg stump, he was not expecting it, adjusted to get a single down to long on
Khan to Ponting, 1 run full again on the leg stump,this is the Ponting on old, flicks it elegantly off the pads through midwicket
Khan to Hussey, 1 run almost in the blockhole, Zaheer on target in this over, dug away to long on
Khan to Ponting, 2 runs another low full toss on the leg stump, Ponting eases it through midwicket, that would have run in to the boundary, had Kohli not got a hand to it, running to his right
Khan to Ponting, 1 run Zaheer has been full and on leg this over, once more, this time he misses out, flicking straight to square leg
Khan to Hussey, 1 run one more low full toss to end with, pushed back down the track, Zaheer falls to his left, but cannot stop it
Ashwin to Ponting, no run charges down the track, it is slower through the air, looks to go over midwicket, the ball rolls away back towards the bowler
Ashwin to Ponting, 2 runs goes for the big sweep, gets it off the inner edge backward of square leg

Ashwin to Johnson, no run stops in the delivery stride, bowls it slowly through the air, he pushes on the off side
Ashwin to Johnson, 1 run and again, stops and bowls, swatted through midwicket, Johnson cannot launch in to those monster hits

Harbhajan to Hussey, 5 wide sees him come down the track, fires it in on leg stump, but it ends up far wide down the leg side, Dhoni had no chance
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run much better now, in the blockhole, he squeezes it out over the bowler

Harbhajan to Johnson, no run Harbhajan in the blockhole, even Mitch cannot tee off from those lengths
Harbhajan to Johnson, 2 runs gets it through midwicket, Yuvraj lost it in the setting sun, was late to get to the ball, gives them time to pick up two
Harbhajan to Johnson, 1 run was waiting for the reverse hit way for ages, but could not get the full toss past short third man

A masterclass from Ricky Ponting, his 30th one-day hundred, allowed Australia to recover from a wobbly 150 for 4 to post 260 on a pitch where the ball is taking sharp turn and stopping on the batsmen. Not for the first time this World Cup, Yuvraj Singh was India's best bowler. There has not been much movement for the seamers. It will be interesting

Sachin and Sehwag are out there. Motera is abuzz. Lee has the ball. Sehwag faces. 5 first-balls went for 4s. What about the sixth? Two slips.
Lee to Sehwag, no run no four! Mini-victory for Lee. Sehwag stands back and punches a length ball to mid on.

Lee to Sehwag, no run hohho! 143 kph and late swing on a full ball on leg stump, Sehwag looks to flick and gets a leading edge down the track. Lee collects and lines up a throw. Sehwag hurries back into the crease
Lee to Sehwag, 1 wide half an appeal as Lee looks to squeeze Sehwag down the leg side. Clips the thigh, but wrongly called a wide

Lee to Sehwag, no run angles in from around middle and off, Sehwag plays back out to mid on
Lee to Sehwag, no run gets away with this one. Seemed like it deserved to be wided. 147 kph from Lee. Who says he is old! Short and wide, Sehwag looks to upper cut and misses.

Lee to Sehwag, no run Australia review a caught behind appeal that was turned down. Monster away seamer from Lee, he's doing Shane Warne at 145 kph. Lands on middle and off stump, short of a length, Sehwag looks to play back and is groping inside the line as the ball nips off. Did he edge it? He moved his back foot across to cover the line an

Tait to Tendulkar, no run aha, Tait gets one back, slips a pacy short of length ball outside off. Sachin looks to cut and misses. Tait tells him what he thinks about it.
Tait to Tendulkar, 1 wide 149 kph. The pace is up, but the direction is still a little awry. Very wide outside off and called.
Tait to Tendulkar, no run Tait gets one on the spot, back of a length outside off and jumping up into Sachin's blade as he pushes off the front foot
Tait to Tendulkar, no run this is a family site, so I won't say what Tait just told Tendulkar. The ball was fine though - hustling Sachin with a mean bouncer, Sachin just got under it and let it go.
Tait to Tendulkar, 1 run ends with another wide and short ball, it was so wide Sachin could not middle the cut. He under-edges it to third man, and looks at the bat.
Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run ahem, length ball on off stump, Sachin pushes into the covers and takes off. Sehwag takes around a year to make the single.
Lee to Sehwag, 1 run 144 kph, and slanting into the pads, Sehwag tucks it away backward of the man at leg gully for a single
Lee to Tendulkar, no run draws him out with a full delivery at 146 kph on off stump, Sachin leans into a drive but ends up playing it back down the track.

Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run not in control this time. Lee gets this one to bounce extra as Sachin cuts and he plays uppishly backward if point for a single. The top hand came off in an attempt to control that.

Lee to Tendulkar, no run good searching delivery to end the over, 146.6 kph away seamer outside off, but Sachin shoulders arms
Tait to Sehwag, no run full length ball outside off, Sehwag doesn't really come forward as he drives powerfully to wide mid off
Tait to Sehwag, (no ball) uh oh, Tait bowls a pretty good bouncer but he's over stepped. Sehwag ducked under this one. He won't duck under the next one.

Tait to Sehwag, no run back of a length, Sehwag plays from the crease and defends down the track
Tait to Sehwag, no run over-pitched on off stump at 147 kph. Too full for Sehwag to get under and time the drive, he plays it off the lower end of the bat into the covers

Lee to Tendulkar, 1 run Lee has Sachin where he wants him - at the non-striker's end. Short ball, hustling into Sachin at 143 kph and he tucks it through the now vacant leg gully for one
Lee to Sehwag, 1 run another good ball, Sehwag plays a short ball at 137 kph off the back foot to midwicket and gets a single
Lee to Tendulkar, no run fuller at 143 kph, looks to get Sachin driving and he punches with accomplishment straight to mid on

Lee to Tendulkar, no run full and straight at 149 kph, Sachin punches to mid off

Johnson to Sehwag, no run ooh, whips in an inducker on middle at 138 kph and Sehwag looks to flick from the crease. Inside edge onto the pad.

Johnson to Sehwag, no run back of a length, Sehwag again hangs back and defends down the track

Johnson to Tendulkar, no run back of a length on off stump, Sachin gets half across and defends down the track again.

Watson to Sehwag, 1 run length ball at 131 kph, the drop in pace is telling. Sehwag whips off the pads through midwicket for a single

Watson to Tendulkar, no run full and angled into the pads, Sachin flicks straight to wide mid on

Johnson to Tendulkar, no run over-pitched outside off at 144 kph and for once, Sachin mistimes a drive. Inside edged back down the track.

Watson to Sehwag, OUT Sehwag is gone. He hasn't looked his best through this innings. Watson has got him with a bouncer that wasn't very high on pace, but was spot on with its direction. Watson to Tendulkar, no run length ball outside off, Sachin looks to play back and steer, but can't get it away

Watson to Tendulkar, no run lets the next one go outside off, fuller length and Sachin shoulders arms.

Johnson to Tendulkar, no run whanged in on leg stump, short of a length and Sachin looks to whip around the corner. He can't get it away.

Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run India have 50, nudging a length ball on middle and leg towards midwicket for a single

Hussey to Kohli, no run goes for a forcing shot, but mistimes it to the bowler
Hussey to Kohli, 1 run fuller this time, and he bashes it in the air, Gambhir ducks underneath the missile as it flies at him, goes towards long on
Hussey to Gambhir, no run some turn for David, bounce too, played uncertainly on the off side
Hussey to Gambhir, no run played out on the off side, this time there is no single
Clarke to Kohli, 1 run loopy full toss, Kohli misses out, slaps it away right to sweeper cover
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run angles across the left-hander, tapped away late towards point, deft
Clarke to Kohli, FOUR runs finally Kohli gets some reward for those meaty whiplash drives, drives with the turn past extra cover, no chance for sweeper cover
Clarke to Kohli, 1 run bowler and keeper interested as they think there might be some pad, this one was guided fine on the off side
Clarke to Gambhir, 1 run worked in front of square leg
Clarke to Kohli, 2 runs whipped away off the back foot in front of square leg
Hussey to Gambhir, no run defended off the front foot calmly
Hussey to Gambhir, 1 run guided towards point, they take on the fielder and get the single easily
Hussey to Yuvraj, FOUR runs another full toss! Another heave over the leg side, but Yuvraj gets well under it and slams it over midwicket. Just. He's away with a boundary.
Hussey to Yuvraj, no run faster ball, fired in at 97 kph outside off, Yuvraj just lets it go
Hussey to Yuvraj, no run Hussey slips in the armer, Yuvraj misses as he plays for the turn and is struck, but that might have been sliding down the leg side
Krejza to Gambhir, 2 runs Gambhir shimmies down the track, gets to the pitch of an offie on off stump and powers it through extra cover for a couple. He's looking good against spin.
Krejza to Gambhir, 1 run short of a length on the pads, Gambhir stays back and taps to square leg. 150 up.

Krejza to Yuvraj, FOUR runs Yuvraj has played this paddle sweep well in this World Cup. It's not a shot he played much previously, but boy he's hitting them alright. Krejza drops this well outside leg, the bat comes over it from cover and swipes it easily through to fine leg
Krejza to Yuvraj, 1 leg bye fired in fast and full, Yuvraj misses the whip and gets a leg bye to the leg side

Krejza to Gambhir, no run Gambhir jumps out again, real early, Krejza sees him and holds it back and gets it to grip and turn away. Gambhir is left stranded mid-pitch, groping for it, but manages to stab it away.
Krejza to Gambhir, 1 run again he trots out, but this time it is very full on the pads and he heaves to the leg side for one
Hussey to Gambhir, 1 run Hussey tosses it up on the pads, Gambhir gets inside the line and nudges to square leg
Hussey to Yuvraj, 1 run tossed up outside off, Yuvraj seems to mean business, huge follow through as he check drives to long off for one
Hussey to Gambhir, no run Gambhir is fidgetting all around the crease, this time he backs away and looks for the cut, but ends up defending as Hussey fires it in straight.
Hussey to Gambhir, no run down the track, gets to the pitch and cover drives well, but can't beat the infield
Hussey to Gambhir, no run pushes a length ball to mid off, Yuvraj wants one, but Gambhir doesn't
Hussey to Gambhir, no run plays back to another sharp armer that comes in, and Gambhir manages to stab away through backward point for one
Krejza to Yuvraj, 2 runs Yuvraj is looking good, camps on the back foot for Krejza's offie to come on around off stump and then whips easily through midwicket
Krejza to Yuvraj, 1 run on the back foot again, punched with the spin through mid off for one.
Krejza to Gambhir, 1 run uppish but safely so. Tossed up outside off, Gambhir looks to play the inside out carve over point and gets it out to the outfield.

Krejza to Yuvraj, 1 run heart in mouth moment for Yuvraj. Sweeps a delivery from outside off, against the turn, with a man in the deep and gets a top edge that hangs in the air for ever. When it comes down behind square leg, it lands in vacant real estate
Krejza to Gambhir, 2 runs Gambhir does his sashay down the pitch and pick up with the spin again, more control this time as he spoons it to deep extra cover for two more.
Krejza to Gambhir, 1 run single to end the over as Gambhir waits for a back of length ball on off stump and guides again through point

Johnson to Gambhir, 1 run 50 for Gambhir, his third in the World Cup. And he's apparently not in form, according to some. Full length ball outside off, seemed to be going away as Gambhir covered the line and opened the face to steer through point

Johnson to Yuvraj, no run through Yuvraj. Oohs and aahs from the crowd. He neither gets forward nor stays back and pokes at a length ball that comes in with the angle from amidships. Misses the inside edge and the stumps.
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run tight line from Mitch, no reverse yet. Holds its line from short of a length and Yuvraj defends to point from the crease

Johnson to Yuvraj, no run oh boy, Gambhir escapes. Ponting misses the stumps. Full on the toes, Yuvraj times the flick really well and Gambhir took off, but Yuvraj had hit it straight to Ponting at midwicket. He lines up a throw and lets fly. Gambhir had given up. Miss and he survives.
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run short ball, cramping Yuvraj for room and tucking him up, he does well to jump and nudge to the leg side for one
Johnson to Gambhir, no run similar ball to Gambhir, who also leaps onto the backfoot to leap and drop it down

Hussey to Yuvraj, no run this is horrendous running. Complete communication breakdown, says Sanjay Manjrekar. Arm ball on the stumps, Yuvraj plays all around it and it pops away to the leg side. Gambhir starts and stops. Yuvraj starts and stops. The throw goes to the batter's end. Should have gone to the other end.

Hussey to Yuvraj, OUT infantile running. Gambhir is gone. That was even more horrendous. Not sure what was happening there again. Yuvraj guides a ball outside off backward of square, very fine on the off side. The ball went nowhere, and first slip was after it. Gambhir wants a single and runs three-fourths of the way down the track. Yuvraj h
Hussey to Yuvraj, no run

Hussey to Yuvraj, 1 run this match is alive. India are stuttering for no reason. Yuvraj is early into a chip into the off side and it is nearly played right back at Hussey who puts the right arm out on his follow through. Too far away though.
Hussey to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni leans out to a delivery breaking in from outside off and gets a single
Hussey to Yuvraj, 1 run Yuvraj nudges a full ball to midwicket, lots of chatter even before they get a single to a vacabt midwicket area.
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run top delivery from Mitch, bouncer that curls away in the air after landing. Yuvraj looks out of his range as he weaves on the back foot as it goes away.
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run fuller delivery on off, Yuvraj gingerly gets onto the front foot and pushes to mid off.
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 leg bye over-pitched and slanted onto the pads, Yuvraj looks to whip and it runs away backward of square leg for one. Off the pads.
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run full delivery outside off, Dhoni gets the foot half across and drops into the covers for a single
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run Mitch is making Yuvraj look ordinary. He lands one back of a length on the seam and gets it to jar away as Yuvraj gropes inside the line.
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run Yuvraj goes fishing outside off again, and misses. Looked to steer to third man, and just as well for him that he didn't get bat on it.

Hussey to Dhoni, FOUR runs Dhoni's got a boundary to release some of the pressure. Poor delivery from Hussey, lands it midway and it turns in a little, but there was enough room for Dhoni to whack the cut through the covers. Ponting makes a huge effort in the infield and injures his already dodgy little finger. Deep point runs across and mak
Hussey to Dhoni, 1 run tossed up outside off, Dhoni powers the cover drive away for one more
Hussey to Yuvraj, no run back of a length on off and middle, Yuvraj defends from the crease
Hussey to Yuvraj, no run full toss on off stump, Yuvraj misses out, completely mistiming the cover drive and he gets it out to point

Hussey to Yuvraj, 1 run Hussey escapes with a poor ball, short and going down the leg side, Yuvraj looks to paddle-pull to fine leg, but Ponting at short fine leg is on it. Today, Ponting has been everywhere!
Hussey to Dhoni, no run again it is Ponting, this time at cover. Dhoni pushes a full delivery on off to his right, but the Aussie captain slides and slips away to deny him the single

Johnson to Yuvraj, 2 runs imprint lbw delivery, full and tailing into the pads, but Yuvraj manages to get the bat down at the last moment and flick to deep square leg. Lee cleans up as they get a second.
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run short ball, Yuvraj is readily on the back foot and hops back to the 143 kph bumper to drop it to the leg side
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run there are no fish in the Kankaria lake in Ahmedabad, but Yuvraj is really fishing hard. Another lazy flail at a back of length ball outside off, swish and a miss.

Johnson to Yuvraj, FOUR runs and you wonder why he does that fishing thing, when he can play shots like these. 143 kph delivery angling into the pads, Yuvraj gets the front foot into line and thumps it through the line, between the bowler and mid on. Right out of the screws, as they say.

Johnson to Yuvraj, 2 runs another good shot as Mitch again searches for the lbw, with one angling into the pads, Yuvraj whips it backward of square and Lee puts in a huge effort at deep backward square leg to save four.
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run ooh, Mitch gets one to nip in a touch as Yuvraj pushes outside the line and looks to defend. Bat first? Pad first? No appeal.

Lee to Dhoni, no run India are running like a dodgy tummy that's eaten more spices that it should have. Sharp inducking bouncer at Dhoni who hops back and defends off the inside edge to the leg side. Yuvraj wants a single now. What's this affliction for running non-existent singles? Gets back just in time.

Lee to Dhoni, no run reverse swing. Horror shot. Dhoni survives. Lee gets a full delivery at 143 kph to curl in, Dhoni has a huge swing at it and misses. It goes in through the bat and pad gap to the keeper.

Lee to Dhoni, OUT Dhoni has perished. He's not been in great form, and clearly that's affecting his thinking. After the last two balls, you'd have expected better than a wild airy cut to a short ball. That was again pacy from Lee, got it to bounce extra and Dhoni had no control on the cut. Seemed like he wanted to hit it right through Clarke
Lee to Raina, no run firmly planted on the back foot as he's expecting a bouncer, but Lee delivers this full and wide outside off. Raina pushes it without much assurance to the off side
Lee to Raina, no run short ball from round the wicket, ends up outside off as Raina hangs back and taps towards point. Dot ball. Required rate is over six, for the first time tonight.
Lee to Raina, no run fantastic stuff from Lee. Wicket-maiden on his return to the attack. Length ball angling in from outside off, Raina stays in the crease and plays into the covers
Tait to Yuvraj, 1 run short ball aimed at the body, Yuvraj hops back and whips through square leg for one. Could have been two. Poor running.
Tait to Raina, 1 run Raina plays his own brand of the controlled pull. He's sitting back and plays it in ginger fashion to deep square leg for one
Tait to Yuvraj, no run another short ball, Yuvraj jumps up and back in the crease and defends to the off side
Tait to Yuvraj, no run late swing, full at 151 kph and curving away from middle and leg towards off. Yuvraj squeezes it off the outside half of the bat to point
Tait to Yuvraj, no run still can't get the single. Tait keeps it short from round the wicket, Yuvraj looks to steer backward of point but finds the fielder

Tait to Yuvraj, FOUR runs Yuvraj's hit a stunning boundary here. Somewhat risky and in the air, but he seemed to know what he was doing. Tait gives him just enough width outside off to get under and crack it over point. It nearly carries all the way, a couple of metres inside the ropes.

Lee to Raina, FOUR runs that's as assured as you will ever see Raina playing a short ball. He camps back in the crease, waiting for the ball that's coming at the ribs, but this one from Lee doesn't lift so much. Raina has it in his range and rolls the wrists over the pull and through to midwicket for four more.
Lee to Raina, 1 run the crowd finds some energy again, Raina drops a length ball into the covers and gets a single to cover. For a change, some good running.
Lee to Yuvraj, 1 wide Lee slips one too far wide outside off.
Lee to Yuvraj, no run aha, swing and a miss. Oohs and aahs! Yuvraj sets up a strong base on leg stump line and looks to go up and over the off side. The ball whizzes past, short of a length.

Lee to Yuvraj, FOUR runs top shot from Yuvraj. India are turning it back to an even keel. How did he get that away? That was a stunning yorker from Lee. Coming in from wide of the crease and ending on off stump, at the toes. Yuvraj calmly comes down on it, and opens the face to send it scurrying fine of third man. How?!
Lee to Yuvraj, no run aha, back of a length, Yuvraj pushes to cover. Raina wants one, is sent back and dives in before the throw comes in.

Lee to Yuvraj, FOUR runs sensational counter-punch this from Yuvraj. He knows momentum is everything in this chase now. Short of a length ball outside off, Yuvraj is on the front foot as he walks into a murderous carve over cover point.
Tait to Raina, 1 run Raina does the sane thing. Short ball angling across, he hops back and guides backward of point for a single

Tait to Yuvraj, 2 runs overthrows now. It's all happening. Yuvraj calmly taps a length ball to the off side and they run a single. The throw is horrendous. Haddin doesn't collect. They get a second. Ponting thinks they should not have run, since Raina was in Haddin's way. Doesn't seem to really have a case.
Tait to Yuvraj, 5 wide Tait's gifted five more and an extra ball. He's slanted this a mile outside off. Haddin can't collect.
Tait to Yuvraj, 1 run slower ball at 127 kph. Yuvraj spots it and taps to cover point for a single.

Tait to Raina, 2 runs Raina's pull again. He's pulled Lee. He's now pulled Tait. On this pitch, the short ball is not a worry. He manages to swivel around and keep it down to deep midwicket as it comes towards the waist. 25 have come off the last 10 balls.

Tait to Raina, no run the pressure is showing on everyone! Raina looks to heave a cover drive to a ball well outside off, without getting across. Inside edge misses the stumps, Haddin comes across to stop it, Raina wanders out and hurries back in. Tait tells him what he thinks of it.

Tait to Raina, 2 runs scorcher of a yorker, but he's ended up sliding it onto the pads. Raina skips inside the line and flicks neatly to the deep. Australia are not fielding at their best now. Horror throw comes in mid-pitch and they get a second easily.
Krejza to Yuvraj, no run tossed up outside off, driven carefully to cover. A rare dot ball.
Krejza to Yuvraj, 1 run smart play from Yuvraj. Short of a length on middle and leg, he taps it to the vacant midwicket region for one
Krejza to Raina, no run is that Krejza or Murali? Curls in with the arm, lands outside off and then breaks away sharply as Raina feels for it. Hmm.
Krejza to Raina, no run leading edge now. Krejza again gets big spin from leg stump line and Raina looks to work it to the leg side. Plays it back to the bowler.
Krejza to Raina, no run fuller on middle and off, Raina is stout in defence, reaching out and smothering it this time.,
Krejza to Raina, 1 run Krejza drops short, he has done that off and on today. Raina waits and forces him off the back foot through the covers for a single
Watson to Raina, 1 run back of a length on the leg stump, worked to the leg side for a single
Watson to Yuvraj, 1 run short ball on the pads, Yuvraj quietly tucks it to midwicket for a single
Watson to Raina, 1 run Raina shuffles across like a card dealer in Las Vegas would. Gets prone on middle stump but works it in front of square leg for one
Watson to Yuvraj, no run hmm, straight and slowish, Yuvraj is early on the forcing shot through on side and just keeps it down.

Watson to Yuvraj, FOUR runs you have to feel for Lee. He's made a monumental effort at fine leg, but it is still four. Short ball on leg stump, Yuvraj gets inside the line and plays down on it, the pull hurries down to fine leg. Lee runs a mile to his left and then dives full length. He gets a hand on the ball, but the ball bounces up and hi
Watson to Yuvraj, no run back of a length on off stump, Yuvraj plays it calmly into the covers
Krejza to Raina, 1 run tossed up and turning away from outside off, Raina lunges to the flight of the ball and dabs it into the covers for one
Krejza to Yuvraj, 1 run on Yuvraj's pads, he dinks another easy single to square leg

Krejza to Raina, no run can someone teach Krejza the lbw law please? Short ball lands on leg, doesn't turn is going too high, well over the tenth stump if there were one. Raina looks to heave and misses. Krejza appeals.
Krejza to Raina, 1 run fuller outside off, Raina taps into the covers for another single
Krejza to Yuvraj, no run huge spin, lands on leg and more than straightens. Yuvraj is almost opened up as he turns the bat too early.
Krejza to Yuvraj, no run short but no turn, hurries along as Yuvraj looks to cut. Bottom edged onto the turf.
Watson to Raina, 1 run length ball from Watson on the leg stump, Raina looks to muscle it over deep square leg, but doesn't time it so well. Just as well, on the bounce to the man in the deep.

Watson to Yuvraj, 1 run Yuvraj runs in like a fiend. Defends a length ball to David Hussey and mid off, runs like a man possessed and dives like Ian Thorpe, full on and into the crease. Would have made his ground if it had hit. It didn't
Watson to Raina, 1 run another bouncer at Raina, he somehow manages to redirect it to midwicket for a single

Watson to Yuvraj, 2 runs Fifty to Yuvraj. Each run has come under immense pressure. Fourth fifty of the World Cup. Length ball on the pads, Yuvraj is inside the line and hops onto the back foot as he nudges to deep backward square leg for a couple.

Watson to Yuvraj, 1 run he's doing it easily at the moment. This is top-notch one-day batting on display. Length ball angling across him, Yuvraj opens the face of the bat as he dabs to third man for one more
Watson to Raina, 1 run Raina gets one more, stays on the back foot but whips in front of square easily for a single.

Lee to Raina, SIX runs Raina has smeared him over long on. Lee lands one on the length, in Raina's business area. Mid on is inside the circle. Raina needs no more incentive to go over the top, he gets the front foot into line and mows it a long way. Huge moment.
Lee to Raina, 1 run back of a length and coming into the pads, Raina dabs through square leg for a single
Lee to Yuvraj, no run bouncer at 146.9 kph, he does his best to hustle Yuvraj into the corner, but Yuvraj leaps back in the crease and defends towards point. He had that under complete control.
Lee to Yuvraj, no run another short ball, at 143 kph and targetted at the body. Yuvraj stays put on the crease and defends down the track

Lee to Yuvraj, no run Lee has not given up. He sends down a skidding yorker, and Yuvraj plays forward to it and ends up meeting it on the full. Just as well, the outside edge takes it away from the stumps and then it thuds into the turf on the way to Haddin.

Lee to Yuvraj, no run back of a length to end the over, Yuvraj is completely focused - no pressure on him despite playing four successive dot balls. He works it to the leg side of the pitch and stays put in the crease.

Johnson to Raina, FOUR runs India are running home in a hurry. Johnson sends a bouncer down, but misses the line by a fraction. That's exactly what Raina is playing for when he hops inside the line to a bouncer. This one ends up to the right of his body and he glances it along, using Mitch's pace, and it screams away to fine leg.
Johnson to Raina, 1 run short and fast outside off, Raina has things under control now. He opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man for a single
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 leg bye slanting into the pads, Yuvraj gets some pad on it as he looks to flick. Leg bye. India get closer.
Johnson to Raina, 1 run Raina backs away a touch, but Mitch follows him and Raina steers a short ball to deep backward point for a single
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 wide the crowd is delirious. Mitch slants another wide down the leg side. Ponting looks gutted. India are taking this away.
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run slow and back of a length outside off, Yuvraj looks to guide backward of point and he gets an inside edge onto the pads for a single into the off side.

Johnson to Raina, 2 runs another Raina dink through the leg side. Mitch drops a short ball on the pads and Raina will keep tucking them there all day if he has to. There are no fielders there. Easy couple to India. The parties have started in the stands, says Ravi Shastri.
Lee to Yuvraj, no run Lee is still not giving up. Yorker at 139 kph on off stump, Yuvraj looks to deflect it to third man but finds point
Lee to Yuvraj, no run another yorker on middle and leg, Yuvraj can't get anything under it as he drives straight to mid off
Lee to Yuvraj, no run another yorker, marginally off-line, ends up on the toes and Yuvraj could have flicked through backward square leg but couldn't get it away.

Lee to Yuvraj, FOUR runs a poetic moment for the Indian fans. Australia's reign has ended. The crowd has lost it. Yuvraj is on the turf, mid-pitch, arms aloft, looking up at the sky and then waving his bat away in a frenzy of emotions. And just as well. We will have new World Champions, for the first time since 1999. Length ball on off stump

A day for champions. Ponting may have played his last World Cup game. But don't forget what he accomplished today. He overcame poor form, in tough conditions and played a top-class innings. Don't forget Lee, charging in like his life depended on it, spilling blood in an attempt to save four, but running in at 155+ kph and making India sweat all the

But above all, contemplate all that Yuvraj has been through in the last year. He lost his form. He lost his fans. He lost his fitness with an injury. Controversy followed him like a faithful pet. He lost his Test spot. He almost lost his limited-overs spots. He hung in there. And he's taking India past every hurdle in this World Cup. With bat, with
For the sixth time on the trot, there will be at least one Asian team in the World Cup final. Will Sri Lanka make it as well?

After hurtling through the group stages unconvincingly, India have put up their best performance of the World Cup against the defending champions. This was by no means a flawless show, the mid-innings freeze and the mad running will have to be addressed. The pressure will be more in the semis, where Afridi's boys will be waiting.
